Division, Morigaon on 03.08.2022 Severe erosion has been taking place at Muwamari Butting point of B/dyke under Nagaon W.R. Division and Morigaon W.R. Division. The River Brahmaputra in this reach is flowing in almost perpendicular direction towards the bank and taking U turn and severely eroded and the Land mass. Maximum width of erosion is 231m at the butting point till 09.07.2022 and when riverbank has been submerged state in most of the time. Present available minimum offset of the embankment from riverbank is only 14m as on today 09.07.2022. all efforts are being made to prevent breach of the embankment by dumping mostly Type B geo-bags along with type A geo-bags and also lunching PSC porcupine at upstream and also in downstream to minimize the embayment formation and to mitigate the erosion. | 0
